title: counselling
content: When will management quota students be called for counselling? how will the procedure go? will we get private/individual mails, or will it be a common one for everyone to book their slots?

comments.body:
If you’re got your seat,you’ll just have to go submit documents,you’ll get a private mail and you would’ve been informed if you have gotten your seat or if you’re placed on the waitlist 
There is no counselling whatsoever
Damn you really paid 12lakhs per year for pes, with that kinda money you could have maybe studied abroad , and had an edge over even iitians ,Indian education in famous colleges is overrated
With 60 Lakhs , u could have bought land near the outskirts of Bangalore(40 KM away from Bangalore). Due to the Real Estate Boom, it would have become 1-2 crores easily after 4-5 years.
how long for the private mail? no counselling for management quota?
